      • updateStatus

        public void updateStatus(java.lang.String givenStatus)
        Updates status of the current player. If the player is in the last part of their turn, when called, this method moves on to the next player and resets the status to zero.

      • getStatus

        public java.lang.String getStatus()
        returns the current status of the current players game 0 = ROLL 1 = TRADE 2 = BUILD 3 = FINISH
